site_name: Daynes Ridge Kennel L L C

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:55 pm on
03-Apr-18.
The inspector arrived at the facility at 1:55 pm and knocked on the door to the house. The inspector called the
licensee's phone numbers, left messages, waited 30 minutes and then left the facility.

narrative:
